definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
realgar wine (traditionally drunk during the Dragon Boat Festival 端午節|端午节[Duan1 wu3 jie2])

sentences.english: People drink realgar wine to protect themselves from illness.
sentences.chinese: 人们喝雄黄侍者护本身免于害病。

sentences.english: I enjoy drinking realgar wine during the festival.

sentences.english: The drinking of realgar wine is thought to remove poisons from the body.

sentences.english: Realgar is the most important mineral of commercial value in the Nanhua As-Tl deposit, Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 雄黄是云南省南华砷铊矿床中最主要工业矿物。

sentences.english: At Dragon Boat Festival, we also drank realgar wine.

sentences.english: Announcements, updates, is said to ward off evil spraying noon.

sentences.english: South China has the custom of drinking realgar wine during the Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 中国南方有端午节喝雄黄酒的风俗。

sentences.english: As for Realgar, its toxicity was well-known in both ancient Greece and Chinese antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 至于雄黄，古代希腊人和中国人都深知它的毒性。
